description: tarot cards and basic information about them, as well as references to corresponding scans

cards.name: The Fool
cards.description: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life; Reversed: Delays

cards.name: The Magician
cards.description: Action, the power to manifest; Reversed: Misunderstandings.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.description: Inaction, going within, the subconscious; Reversed: Manipulations.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.description: Abundance, nurturing, fertility, life in bloom; Reversed: Neglect

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.description: Structure, stability, rules and power; Reversed: Chaos

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.description: Institutions, tradition, society and its rules; Reversed: Hypocrisy

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.description: Sexuality, passion, choice, uniting; Reversed: Separation

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.description: Movement, progress, integration; Reversed: Defeat

cards.name: Strength
cards.description: Courage, subtle power, integration of animal self; Reversed: Fear

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.description: Meditation, solitude, consciousness; Reversed: Isolation

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.description: Cycles, change, ups and downs; Reversed: Stagnation

cards.name: Justice
cards.description: Fairness, equality, balance; Reversed: Lies

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.description: Surrender, new perspective, enlightenment; Reversed: Stubbornness.

cards.name: Death
cards.description: The end of something, change, the impermeability of all things; Reversed: Limbo

cards.name: Temperance
cards.description: Balance, moderation, being sensible; Reversed: Impatience

cards.name: The Devil
cards.description: Destructive patterns, addiction, giving away your power; Reversed: Freedom

cards.name: The Tower
cards.description: Collapse of stable structures, release, sudden insight; Reversed: Control

cards.name: The Star
cards.description: Hope, calm, a good omen; Reversed: Darkness

cards.name: The Moon
cards.description: Mystery, the subconscious, dreams; Reversed: Paranoia

cards.name: The Sun
cards.description: Success, happiness, all will be well; Reversed: Failure

cards.name: Judgement
cards.description: Rebirth, a new phase, inner calling; Reversed: Regrets

cards.name: The World
cards.description: Completion, wholeness, attainment, celebration of life; Reversed: Incomplete

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.description: Emotional fulfillment, joy; Reversed: Indifferent

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.description: Partnership, mutual attraction, compatibility; Reversed: Abandonment

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.description: Celebration, fun with friends, laughter; Reversed: Jealousy

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.description: Boredom, dissatisfaction with what is being offered; Reversed: Avoidance

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.description: Dwelling on the negative, self-pity; Reversed: Alienation

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.description: Sentimentality, kindness, help; Reversed: Discouraging

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.description: So many choices, indecision, getting lost in fantasy, wishing and dreaming; Reversed: Lethargic

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.description: Abandoning something in search of something better, vision; Reversed: Sacrifice

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.description: Indulgence, self-satisfaction; Reversed: Disintegration

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.description: Emotional bliss, happiness, attainment; Reversed: Disruption

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.description: Creative, inspired, learning artistic skill; Reversed: Gloomy

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.description: Romantic, adventurous, following one’s heart; Reversed: Pessimism

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.description: Emotionally nurturing, intuitive, sensitive; Reversed: Ignorance

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.description: Repression of deep feelings, possible alcoholism; Reversed: Selfishness

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.description: A fresh start, a sudden opportunity or idea, clarity; Reversed: Improbable

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.description: Indecision; Reversed: Conflicts

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.description: Heartbreak, betrayal; Reversed: Torment

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.description: Meditation, rest, retreat; Reversed: Disturbance

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.description: Mind games, hostility; Reversed: Treachery

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.description: Leaving, accepting help, going somewhere better; Reversed: Trouble

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.description: Secret plans, abandoning ship; Reversed: Clumsiness

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.description: feeling powerless and stuck; Reversed: Escaping

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.description: Overactive mind, anxiety; Reversed: Martyrdom

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.description: Feeling defeated, self-sabotage; Reversed: Sabotage

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.description: mentally unstable or intellectually immature, acts without thinking; Reversed: Stupidity

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.description: Fierce, determined, aggressively pursues goals; Reversed: Boredom

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.description: Intelligent, writer, communicative yet cold; Reversed: Ineffective

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.description: Serious, controlling, rational and mind/intellect-focused; Reversed: Foolish

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.description: New beginnings, creative spark, fertile ideas; Reversed: Unpromising

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.description: Contemplation, assessing one’s life direction; Reversed: Dispute

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.description: Reaping the rewards of your efforts; Reversed: Idleness

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.description: Celebration, safety, the home; Reversed: Discord

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.description: Competition, minor struggles or disagreements; Reversed: Timidness

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.description: Success, accolades and achievement; Reversed: Disapproval

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.description: Feeling defensive and on guard; Reversed: Yielding

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.description: Speed, things manifesting quickly; Reversed: Stagnation

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.description: Pessimism, gearing up for the worst; Reversed: Weakness

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.description: Feeling oppressed, exhaustion, too many responsibilities; Reversed: Impractical

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.description: newly inspired, excited about life and work; Reversed: Passive

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.description: An adventurous risk taker who follows his passions; Reversed: Apathy

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.description: Confidant, focused, has zest for life; Reversed: Fatigue

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.description: Career focused, mature, passionate; Reversed: Impostor

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
cards.description: Financial reward, clarity of life purpose, goals; Reversed: Debt

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
cards.description: Balance, multitasking; Reversed: Impractical

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
cards.description: Meaningful work, enjoying one’s work, suitable career; Reversed: Mediocrity

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
cards.description: Hoarding, feeling poor, holding self-back out of fear; Reversed: Greed

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
cards.description: Minor money troubles, health problems, feeling like an outsider; Reversed: Helplessness

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
cards.description: Charity, accepting and giving help; Reversed: Cruelty

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.description: Patience, waiting for your plans to bear fruit; Reversed: Unemployment

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.description: Hard work, focused efforts, laying the groundwork; Reversed: Skill-shortage

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.description: Luxury, rest, financial and material comforts; Reversed: Dependency

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.description: Financial success, strong business relationships; Reversed: Restrictions

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
cards.description: Student, commitment to learning; Reversed: Rookie

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
cards.description: Cautious, sensible and slow to progress; Reversed: Inexperienced

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
cards.description: Healthy in body and finances, grounded and calm; Reversed: Unreasonable

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.description: Enjoys the good life (food, drink and leisure), financially secure; Reversed: Hoarder
